properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c2 v2 c2 v3 c2 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Adavi Chetla Naduma Oka Jaldaru Vruksham Vale Parishuddula Samaajamulo Yesu Prajvalinchuchunnaadu (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: c2
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shaaronu Rojaayane Loya Padmamunu Aayane Athi Parishudhdhudu Aayane Padi Velalo Athi Shreshtudu (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Manovedana Sahinchaleka Siluva Vaipu Ne Choodaga Levanethi Nannethukoni Bhayapadakumani Antivi (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ghanamaina Naa Prabhuva Nee Raktha Prabhaavamuna Naa Hrudayamu Kadigithivi Neeke Naa Sthuthi Ghanatha (2){/lang-eng}
